results.content:
I really like the focus of this course. I think it's great for a short and interesting primer on Bootstrap and jQuery. I would like to have 1080p resolution and I would like to see a more advanced search/filtering/sorting functionality.
I also think that title of the course is a little bit vague. It can be better to attract more people as it is a good one as far short primer concerns. Keep up the good work!
results.content_html:
I really like the focus of this course. I think it's great for a short and interesting primer on Bootstrap and jQuery. I would like to have 1080p resolution and I would like to see a more advanced search/filtering/sorting functionality.
